channel.title: Barbecue Bob's BBQ and Beer Bash
channel.description:
A podcast for Barbecue and Beer Enthusiasts! Barbecue recipes, beer recipes, beer reviews and much more! A fun and informative show with jokes to spare.
Visit my site by going to Barbecue Bob's BBQ and Beer Bash Website!Now LIVE with a huge recipe database. Come by and find a recipe or contribute one of your own specialties.
Visit our daughter's site
Add BBQ Bob's daughter, Catriona, as your new MySpace friend. She is an up and coming new singing sensation! Look for her single, "Waiting for the Light" on iTunes!
BBQ, Beer & Banter! From a few of our sponsors!
